DeregistrationReasonOtherText: Source no longer uses Anhydrous Ammonia

_desc.NAICS_DESCRIPTION: All Other Motor Vehicle Parts Manufacturing

_exec_summary.SummaryText:
d Police departments.  The program includes an emergency response decision tree and notification plan.  Emergency response drills and drill evacuations, and emergency operation and response procedures are reviewed annually.

A process hazard analysis for the ammonia process was conducted and the data indicated that the existing equiptment, training, and safety procedures were adequate.  There are no formal planned changes for the ammonia process at this time.
